name: Root Mayhem (Name Pending)
description: "Four concepts of "roots" fight to be the last one standing, which will earn them the title of "GGJ Game Theme"! For glory and eternal honor, they shall battle until the end" Embody one of four Roots, fight your friends in an arena. Last one standing wins! But beware, another player may join the battle as the Master, throwing hazzards and powerups around. Third person multiplayer party game.
